name: Regenerate Top Players
author: Renshan Animation
content: &quotBai Qi&quot, an unknown game anchor, is about to reach the pinnacle of his life when he accidentally dies while streaming a game called &quotSoul Throne&quot. Unexpectedly, he is reborn into the world of this high-difficulty action game. With his &quotT0-Level&quot game skills from his previous life and the blessing of the system&#039s &quot100 Full-Achieved Max-Level Accounts&quot, can Bai Qi ascend to the throne once again and become the one and only king of that world?
